Registry of Open Data on AWS

DOE's Water Power Technology Office's (WPTO) US Wave dataset

earth observation energy geospatial meteorological sustainability water

Description

Released to the public as part of the Department of Energy's Open Energy Data Initiative, this is the highest resolution publicly available long-term wave hindcast dataset that – when complete – will cover the entire U.S. Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ).

Update Frequency

As needed

License

https://github.com/openEDI/documentation/blob/master/US_Wave.md

Documentation

https://github.com/openEDI/documentation/blob/master/US_Wave.md

Managed By

National Renewable Energy Laboratory

See all datasets managed by National Renewable Energy Laboratory.

Contact

Levi.Kilcher@nrel.gov

Publications

  • SWAN Cycle III version 41.31A by The SWAN team

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    32 Year Wave Hindcast (1979-2010) at 3-hour temporal resolution and down to 200m spatial resolution in HDF5 format
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::wpto-pds-us-wave/v1.0.0/
    AWS Region
    us-west-2
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://wpto-pds-us-wave/v1.0.0/ --no-sign-request
  • Description
    32 Year Wave Hindcast (1979-2010) from select virtual buoys along the West Coast of the United States with 1-hour temporal resolution and direction wave specturm data in HDF5 format
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::wpto-pds-us-wave/v1.0.0/virtual_buoy/
    AWS Region
    us-west-2
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://wpto-pds-us-wave/v1.0.0/virtual_buoy/ --no-sign-request
  • Description
    HSDS US Wave domains
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::nrel-pds-hsds/nrel/US_wave/
    AWS Region
    us-west-2
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://nrel-pds-hsds/nrel/US_wave/ --no-sign-request
